title: Cosmologist Gift
alt: These neutrinos were freshly produced by a local source just 8 minutes ago
transcript:
[A picture of a box with writing on one side. The box's lid is slightly hanging off the right edge of the box so you can see inside. The inside of the box is black.]30,000 neutrinos
Freshly produced
Plus 4 zeptograms 
of dark matter[Caption below the panel]: 
Cosmologists are easy to shop for because you can just get them a box.
